feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.5.16
entry.content:
• Managed to fix the broken middle view. Now it's just a desktop and mobile view.

  • Fixed version and updates for mobile view

  • Fixed (https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/421) @7rumpk1n noted the UI header is inconsistent in size; now fixed
  • Fixed (https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/441) @7rumpk1n noted the wording for schedules to the left should be above is now fixed
  • Logs desktop view no longer clashes on desktop view (still have to fix for mobile)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.5.14...6.5.16

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.5.17
entry.content: Main headers have color now

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.5.18
entry.content: • New setting to hide resources from main home page. (By default it is on)

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.5.19
entry.content:
Proper SSL Fix - https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/444 from @jharder01

What's Changed

  • Implement SSL verification settings in route connection tests. Clarifâ€¦ by @jharder01 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/444
  • chore: bump version from 6.5.18 to 6.5.19 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/446

New Contributors

  • @jharder01 made their first contribution in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/444

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.5.18...6.5.19
